::Shadow Wing::

She runs and gets up to the ramp.  She turns and fires lazars at the 
nearest pred.  She ran inside and went running to the bridge.  She 
had to sent another call for help.  She hoped that this time the 
other Maximal ship would here the call.  She turned a few corners and 
headed to the bridge.
